name: ant
description: ant (animate text) is an easy-to-use JavaScript library that provides a simple way to animate text when they appear on the viewport. With ant, you can create eye-catching text animations without the need for complex CSS or JavaScript animations. The library supports a range of animation effects, whether you're building a landing page, an online portfolio, or an e-commerce site, ant is a powerful tool for adding visual interest to your text content.
author: Nelson Michael
